comment:
CR-081 pre-review: COMPLIANT. All verification items passed.

FRONTMATTER: title = "Fix tmux default terminal dimensions" (present, non-empty). revision_summary = "Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1).

CONTENT (Sections 1-9, pre-approved scope per SOP-002 Section 6): All required sections present and substantive. Purpose clearly identifies the 80x24 tmux default causing visual misalignment. Scope includes context, changes summary, and files affected. Current State and Proposed State are concise and well-defined. Change Description provides detailed technical implementation across three subsections (backend config, tmux creation, frontend resize). Justification addresses problem, impact of inaction, and root cause. Impact Assessment covers files, documents, and other impacts. Testing Summary describes three manual verification items. Implementation Plan has five sequenced steps.

EXECUTION SECTIONS (10-11): Template placeholders present as expected at pre-review stage. These sections are editable during execution per SOP-002 Section 6.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found in Sections 1-9. None found.

FORMATTING: Section numbering sequential and correct (1-12). Markdown formatting consistent. Tables properly formatted. Code blocks annotated. No typos or grammatical errors found.

TRACEABILITY: CR-080 referenced as discovery context (closed per git history). SOP-001 and SOP-002 referenced.

DOCUMENTS AFFECTED: None -- no controlled documents require revision. Hub backend and GUI frontend are not under SDLC governance. No RS/RTM impact.

No TU assignment required. The changes affect agent-hub infrastructure (config, container management, GUI hooks) which are outside the Flow State SDLC-governed domains (UI, Scene, Sketch, Simulation).

Recommend for approval.
